author: Staff Reporter
text:
Mahila Court here on Tuesday awarded life imprisonment to a man booked under the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012 for sexually abusing a nine-year-old girl.

A. Poosamuthu (39) from Devaseri near Vadipatti was booked by Samayanallur All Women Police in June 2014 for allegedly abducting and raping the girl.

Mahila Court Judge K. Devadoss awarded life imprisonment and Rs. 5,000 fine for the offences booked under the POCSO Act and another 10 years of imprisonment and Rs. 2,000 fine for other offences booked under various sections of the IPC.

The judge ruled that both the sentences would run concurrently.
title: Life imprisonment for child abuse
